root.name: Lunatic Fantasy
root.description: OverviewLunatic Fantasy is an obscure Sharp X68000 adventure game with the occasional RPG-esque battles. The game was develop by a small Japanese doujin developer named Studio Light Cross in 1993 and was never commercially released. Stardust Crusaders released an English translation patch for Lunatic Fantasy on May 18, 2012, which brought more attention to this obscure title.
